News.Title: BEML Land Assets announces board changes
News.Summary: BEML Land Assets Limited extends CMD and Non-Executive Director tenure for one year while Government Nominee Director ceases due to superannuation from Ministry of Defence services.

News.Title: BEML Land Assets Reports Q3FY26 Loss of ₹46.04 Lakhs
News.Summary: BEML Land Assets Limited reported a net loss of ₹46.04 lakhs for Q3FY26, with total expenses of ₹46.04 lakhs and zero revenue. Nine-month losses widened to ₹373.68 lakhs.

News.Title: BEML Land Assets Board Meet Set for Jan 23, 2026
News.Summary: BEML Land Assets Limited has scheduled a board meeting on January 23, 2026, to consider and approve Q3 FY26 unaudited financial results. Trading window remains closed until January 25, 2026.

News.Title: BEML Land Assets Reports Loss of ₹274.16 Lakhs in Q1 Results
News.Summary: BEML Land Assets Limited reported a net loss of ₹274.16 lakhs for the quarter ended June 30, 2025, compared to a loss of ₹212.09 lakhs in the same period last year. The company recorded no revenue from operations during the quarter. Total expenses increased to ₹274.16 lakhs from ₹212.09 lakhs year-over-year, driven by higher employee benefits expense (₹14.16 lakhs vs ₹12.88 lakhs), finance costs (₹24.66 lakhs vs ₹12.47 lakhs), and other expenses (₹233.29 lakhs vs ₹184.86 lakhs). Earnings per share was negative at ₹0.66 compared to negative ₹0.51 in the previous year. The company's equity share capital remained unchanged at ₹4,164.45 lakhs, while reserves stood at negative ₹4,327.45 lakhs. The Board of Directors approved these unaudited financial results in their meeting held on July 30, 2025.

News.Title: BEML Land Assets: Q3 FY25 Loss Narrows, Revenue Remains Flat
News.Summary: BEML Land Assets reported Q3 FY25 results with a loss of ₹0.44 crore, down 21.43% YoY. Revenue remained at ₹0 crore. Operating income improved by 72.55% YoY. EPS stood at ₹-0.11, a 15.38% YoY increase.
